title: Question:
author: elevates
created_time: April 24, 2023, 01:34:34 PMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 01:59:01 PM by elevates
content: I was going through Instagram reels and found a video. The video is from the Simpson sitcom which has been on the air for about 31 years. This series has been known to predict major global events. Considering their prediction being correct for all significant events happening globally. I felt I should share the below image. I know some of you would say it is just a FOMO created by someone. I have no comment regarding that! What do you think? Will the next Bitcoin happen in 2025? I feel it won't happen in 2025. If history repeats itself then it would be in 2026. It is a possibility that it can happens in 2024.

comments.author: dlightag
comments.body: The next Bull Run of Bitcoin has no specific date to anyone, but rather it surely come sooner or later. Bitcoin is the number one coin in the cryptocurrency market and appreciate in value as long people keep demand Bitcoin and supply get less, which the scarcity of Bitcoin will skyrocket and seeing as Bull run. Therefore Bitcoin still in good position for entry point to buy, while waiting for right time to come.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Bitcoin halving event is one of the catalysts of the Bitcoin bull run.  As far as I observed, a market bull run sometimes initiates a few months before or after Bitcoin halving event.  So it is possible that the Bitcoin market will fully transition to a bullish trend in the year 2024.Quote from: elevates on April 24, 2023, 01:34:34 PMIf history repeats itself then it would be in 2026. It is a possibility that it can happens in 2024.    What made you think that the Bitcoin bull run happen 2 years after the halving?  According to history, the bull run peaked a year after the halving so we might see Bitcoin bull run peak in 2025 and also the possibility of a market transition after Bitcoin recorded its new ATH.

comments.author: darkv0rt3x
comments.body: I really don't care less. But it's always funny to see how these crystal balls are going! I like Simpsons and a few other TV Shows like Ricky and Morty but guessing the future is always a funny exercise. Regarding the future of Bitcoin and the Bull and Bear cycles, who knows? Nevertheless, my strategy has always and will always be HODL!

comments.author: eightdots
comments.created_time: April 24, 2023, 02:30:34 PMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 02:44:47 PM by eightdots
comments.body: Acting on predictions seems to me like following other people's decisions. That's why I don't like it much. It doesn't matter to me whether the next bull comes in 1 year or 2 years. The only thing I'm sure of is that bull season will come again. That's why I think it's best to invest. Taurus will come, of course, but it's important to be ready, too. Otherwise, we are always waiting for a new bull season.Many other useful things can be followed instead of predictions. If the steps to be taken are taken according to the developments, a more effective way can be followed. It can be more useful to follow many different factors such as news, desired developments and actual developments. Everyone is guessing, of course someone will keep it. Therefore, you should not worry too much about the forecasts.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on April 24, 2023, 01:34:34 PMWhat do you think? Will the next Bitcoin happen in 2025? I feel it won't happen in 2025. If history repeats itself then it would be in 2026. It is a possibility that it can happens in 2024.Bitcoin halving is believed to occur every four years and this is what we have been having right from time, the last one we had was in 2020 and we are expecting another next year which is 2024, but not until that time comes, we are likely to have a high volatility of bitcoin price and this is when the bullrun occur when the price increases in creating a new all time high, this has been the only history we use to have every four years, the bullrun may set in before or after the halving, but we don't know the exact time or day, but it will surely come this 2024, let's position ourselves, buy and hodl before the bullrun  era begins.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: I have seen many posts related to that Simpson series and the accuracy of their predictions. But, I will not agree with their prediction this time. The next bull run is already in preparation and it will most probably start before halving. And, after halving the magnitude of the bull run will go way higher than our imagination. During this coming bull run the price of Bitcoin will definitely cross $100k mark.We should have already reached to the point of bull run before 2025. And in 2025 the bear run might start after first 6 months. That has always been happening, and history will repeat itself once again after that bull run. The market may crash and the lowest dip might be around ATH of previous bull run. That is just speculation, and things might be different after the next bull run.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.created_time: April 24, 2023, 04:49:14 PMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 08:19:03 PM by Frankolala
comments.body: Since the creation of bitcoin,it moves in circle making it's event repeating in every four years. Bitcoin price will repeat history again as observed by analyst. This shows that 2024 will be bitcoin halving,and this halving is what makes the price to move to the moon,because the number of bitcoin to be mined will reduce into halve. Making miners to be able to mine less numbers of bitcoin.This is where the concept of demand and supply plays its own role in bitcoin price. Check out from 2009 till date,after every halving bitcoin price with hit ATH the next year,higher than the previous ATH price. This is because the number of bitcoin keeps on reducing in supply. To summarize it all,bitcoin price will keep on pumping till bitcoin halving in 2024,after that we will enter the bull run,when bitcoin price will hit ATH in 2025. No one knows the exact time but the year is certain.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: I now more have no doubt that there will be one, maybe between the years 2024-2026. Increased institutional adoption and currency devaluation are mostly what's going to cause the next. And in fact, every day passing by I have even less doubt. The banking sector is just shaking. The debt follows an exponential path. And the more those two apply, the more the people demand safe havens to trust their wealth to. Bitcoin is ticking.

comments.author: LFC_Bitcoin
comments.body: Historically we get each cycle high approximately 12-18 months after the halving so a parabolic run in 2025 definitely makes sense as the halving in Q2 2024.I expect $180,000 per coin or something like that as the hogh.Fingers crossed.

comments.author: bitzizzix
comments.body: Predictions of other people or anything can only be used as our motivation that the price of bitcoin will rise, although most predictions are not always accurate because there will definitely be obstacles or whatever due to several factors that have never been known before. And this is what makes bitcoin prices inseparable from fluctuations that occur very drastically.and I think an accurate prediction is to assess the development of bitcoin even if the price goes down because this will ensure that the price of bitcoin will rise in the long term. And this revolutionary technology has fueled an entire industry aimed at disrupting the traditional financial market system, and bitcoin is well on its way to being widely adopted and regularly used by the mainstream public. So for the long term the price of bitcoin will definitely go up and keep going up even though it will come back down, but in the end it will go up again.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: No wonder this date appeared in the cartoon. a year from now in 2024 there will be a halving, after which statistically there has always been a bull market. I think that unless something global happens in the world, like a third world war or a new crisis or a deadly virus, the simpsons prediction will come true. Many people are waiting for the next halving to hit the bull market, but in the meantime they are accumulating coins.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I really don't think this picture is from The Simpsons, someone probably made it online. It doesn't make sense at all because at that time 31 years ago no one knew anything about cryptocurrencies.I expect that there are a lot of events that have been added by some people and attributed to the series, so we cannot believe everything that is published on the Internet.Personally, I expect the Bitcoin bull market to be at the end of 2024, a few months after the halving.

comments.author: dragonvslinux
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on April 24, 2023, 01:34:34 PMWhat do you think? Will the next Bitcoin happen in 2025? I feel it won't happen in 2025. If history repeats itself then it would be in 2026. It is a possibility that it can happens in 2024.I think the bull market will start in 2024 and continue into 2025. I'm not sure where you got 2026 from, that year to me already sounds like a bear market. A quick review of Bitcoin's history based on it's 4-year cycle2012-2013: Bull market2016-2017: Bull market (+4 years)2020-2021: Bull market (+4 years)So if the 4-year cycles are to continue, based on Bitcoin's halving that occurs every four years, the assumption would be a bull market between 2024-2025.Likewise if we look at the major 1 year long bear markets:2014: Bear market2018: Bear market (+4 years)2022: Bear market (+4 years)This is therefore either an enormous coincidence, or otherwise based on Bitcoin's inflationary policy that is reduced by 50% every year that effectively reduces selling pressure by 50%.Therefore it's highly likely that 2026 will be a bear market based on previous history. For sure this could change, but so far after a decade the cycles remain unchanged.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on April 24, 2023, 05:40:47 PMI really don't think this picture is from The Simpsons, someone probably made it online. It doesn't make sense at all because at that time 31 years ago no one knew anything about cryptocurrencies.I expect that there are a lot of events that have been added by some people and attributed to the series, so we cannot believe everything that is published on the Internet.Personally, I expect the Bitcoin bull market to be at the end of 2024, a few months after the halving.I also agree with your comment about the Simpson's prediction. 31 years ago there wasn't even Bitcoin or anything about crypto so the Simpson cartoon looks like a prediction. I'm sure it was just made by someone on purpose so every event that happens is the same as the Simpson cartoon.regarding the bull market that will happen before the Halving in 2024, it will certainly be the peak of the Bullrun. If the last ATH touched $60k, then when the Halving will occur the ATH will probably be reached again and form a new ATH. Whether we are sure or not, we only need to look at the history that continues to occur every Halving is done. This Bullrun will be highly anticipated by all long-term crypto holders.

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: serjent05 on April 24, 2023, 01:58:35 PMWhat made you think that the Bitcoin bull run happen 2 years after the halving?  According to history, the bull run peaked a year after the halving so we might see Bitcoin bull run peak in 2025 and also the possibility of a market transition after Bitcoin recorded its new ATH.That's too far in my opinion but we are not sure about the next bullrun.However, I am sure that the previous historical records may end in 2024 or even occur in 2025, so this is very likely to occur so that it is not too long from the 2024 halving.Quote from: LFC_Bitcoin on April 24, 2023, 05:15:14 PMHistorically we get each cycle high approximately 12-18 months after the halving so a parabolic run in 2025 definitely makes sense as the halving in Q2 2024.I expect $180,000 per coin or something like that as the hogh.Fingers crossed.My prediction assumption is that the real rally will be 2025 where the process after the halving in Q2 2024 will take quite a long time until 2025.But there is a lot of speculation about that, you don't know what will happen later, it's just that the hopes are so high, the value of the increase is many times over.That $150,000 is ideal in the next ATH.But people are free to do what they want in their speculators.

comments.author: milewilda
comments.body: Quote from: elevates on April 24, 2023, 01:34:34 PMI was going through Instagram reels and found a video. The video is from the Simpson sitcom which has been on the air for about 31 years. This series has been known to predict major global events. Considering their prediction being correct for all significant events happening globally. I felt I should share the below image. I know some of you would say it is just a FOMO created by someone. I have no comment regarding that! --What do you think? Will the next Bitcoin happen in 2025? I feel it won't happen in 2025. If history repeats itself then it would be in 2026. It is a possibility that it can happens in 2024.Really hard to say and making out some conclusion in speaking about bull run event because there's no way for us to tell and lots of rumors and sayings every corner like this and like that but actually there's no way that we could be able to point out on when it would happen.Some people been targeting that 4 year cycle which is something that they would really be that following which i couldn't blame them out because if we do reallysee up some pattern then it do really make out such movement but of course it wont be a guarantee that it would be the same on the next years to come.Quote from: darkv0rt3x on April 24, 2023, 02:19:34 PMI really don't care less. But it's always funny to see how these crystal balls are going! I like Simpsons and a few other TV Shows like Ricky and Morty but guessing the future is always a funny exercise. Regarding the future of Bitcoin and the Bull and Bear cycles, who knows? Nevertheless, my strategy has always and will always be HODL!We do really have these market cycles which is something inevitable but pointing out huge or major events is something that cant be predicted on the first place.No one ever expects into those huge events back in the past which does indicates that it isnt really that possible to be known.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: I know that after the last halving of 2020, the Bitcoin price increase did not really show a high surge in price, and the market was not really bullish after then. It took about seven months for the market to start showing green as the market had been battling to get to $20k, it was in December of that year that Bitcoin was able to get to $27k through out 2021 when the uptrend just kept going until it gave the new ATH toward the end of 2021. That's how I think it will be this time. The bull market may not really start after the halving, but it's not happening in 2026.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Actually from our assumptions last year and speculations, many render some points that bitcoin bullish always occurs whenever bitcoin complete its rotation of four years before we can as well experience rotation of bitcoin bullish market, so I believe that the four years of occurrence of the bullish market should occurs in 2024, so I believe that this year 2023 is the preamble or the preliminary period of bitcoin against 2024 of our expectations of bullish market,  but I can't assure cryptocurrency investors to depend on such speculation that bitcoin price can rise to the extent of been bull in 2024, while the increase of bitcoin  is been determined by the gravity of its demands.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange on April 24, 2023, 09:19:50 PMI know that after the last halving of 2020, the Bitcoin price increase did not really show a high surge in price, and the market was not really bullish after then. It took about seven months for the market to start showing green as the market had been battling to get to $20k, it was in December of that year that Bitcoin was able to get to $27k through out 2021 when the uptrend just kept going until it gave the new ATH toward the end of 2021. That's how I think it will be this time. The bull market may not really start after the halving, but it's not happening in 2026.I guess the scarcity of BTC can be felt after several months when traders can see fewer sell orders but also sellers demanding high prices. The cycle of halving will always happen as BTC will always be bought by big investors from retail to institutional investors. If the bull run will not happen, it's possible that CBDC is really working and people may not be interested anymore in crypto. And it's not gonna be good for all. I will still wait though.
